title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Culturally Responsive Online Learning Design Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Basic Language Instruction or General Understanding of Multicultural Environments
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more learning activities that promote intercultural understanding in online environments
Learners can develop and apply assessment tools reflecting learner background diversity
Learners can generate two or more culture-comparison discussion topics that stimulate critical thinking
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
